comment: The principle of Well-Founded Recursion, part 3 of 3. Finally, we show that ` F ` is unique. We do this by showing that any function ` H ` with the same properties we proved of ` F ` in ~ wfr1 and ~ wfr2 is identical to ` F ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Apr-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
